content:
Lyn waves and sets down her axe, clasping your hand with a hearty grip. "Good to see you! I hope you didn't come back for another canoe?" She grins. "Actually, doubt I'd have enough dolewood around to make another for you, what with all the others who are asking."

She gestures back to her tools. "Though, if you ain't too busy, maybe you could help me build a canoe for some folk? Seems like you had a knack for it when you put the last one together."

A) Agree to help. Discard all  , and attach the HELPING HAND mission to Lyn.

B) Not today. Discard Lyn. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
